name: Unshakable Grit
summary: You've become hardened by conflict after everything you've faced, and you possess a certain intractable stubbornness.
description: You've become hardened by conflict after everything you've faced, and you possess a certain intractable stubbornness. If the reroll granted to you by your Grit and Tenacity reaction is a success, you get a critical success instead; if it's a critical failure, you get a failure instead.
